remarks: Closure of a finite group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumcl as of 3-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumclOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumclOLD.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumclOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumclOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumclOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumclOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumclOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. B ) $.
